cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on June 8, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7622, Small Business Workforce Pipeline Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 70 (Thursday, April 28, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CROW:
H.R. 7622.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3
``The Congress shall have Power to regulate Commerce with
foreign Nations, and among the several States, and with the
Indian Tribes.''
[Page H4609]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

title: Small Business Workforce Pipeline Act of 2022
